alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 04 at 2:23PM MST until December 05 at 9:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier National Park and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause isolated power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds look to remain along the immediate eastern slopes of the Northern Rocky Mountain Front.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains
